item.title: Universal Testing Machine data analyser
item.description: Instructions During the test, the room temperature should be between $10^\circ$C to $37^\circ$C Copy paste the data received from the UTM. The first column is elongation and the second column is the load applied on the specimen. This app will pre-process the data and generates information. App is loading App is loadingPlease wait. If it is taking longer than 1 minute, please refresh the page. App is processing the information.
